title: Subbu Allamaraju

description:
Links:

  • How Complex Systems Fail by Dr. Richard Cooke (PDF link)

  • Werner Vogels on compartmentalization at AWS
  • “Lorin from Netflix” is Lorin Hochstein and he is a great choice to follow on Twitter

author: Gremlin
itunes:author: Gremlin
itunes:summary: This episode we speak with Subbu Allamaraju. Subbu is a Senior Technologist at the Expedia Group. Topics include: Learning from incidents, changing culture, Why Complex Systems Fail, drifting into failure, forming a hypothesis, showing value from your reliability work, and the importance of understanding how your business makes money.
